name: M.E.O.W. - Mission: Earth On Watch
description:
It's the year 2064. Dogs have conquered humanity after being good boys for such a long time. The cats, afraid of losing their power, moved out to outer space, where they built an army to strike back and reconquer their planet from the Woof-Squad.

M.E.O.W. - Mission: Earth On Watch is a arcade Shoot'em Up/Bullet Hell where the player controls a cat ship, fighting a dog-ship army.

Left Mouse Button to shoot

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

1 - Activate Speed Mode

2- Activate Power Mode
